mapper.sql: id, dno, tno, author, projectUnits, topicname, startDate, endDate, evolve, adjunct, bounty, firstTrial, review, ramark
mapper.select: select * from topic ,teacher where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and teacher.tno=topic.tno
mapper.insert: insert into topic (id, dno, tno, author, projectUnits, topicname, startDate, endDate, evolve, adjunct, bounty, firstTrial, review, ramark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evolve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjunct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bounty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firsttrial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{review,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ramark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update topic
dno = #{dno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tno = #{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
projectUnits = #{projectunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topicname = #{topicname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startDate = #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evolve = #{evolve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adjunct = #{adjunct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bounty = #{bounty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
firstTrial = #{firsttrial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
review = #{review,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ramark = #{ramark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update topic set dno = #{dno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tno = #{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, projectUnits = #{projectunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topicname = #{topicname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startDate = #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evolve = #{evolve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adjunct = #{adjunct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bounty = #{bounty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firstTrial = #{firsttrial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, review = #{review,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ramark = #{ramark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
